a.style: font-family:"Playfair Display", Georgia, "Times New Roman", serif

text.tspan: Capital intensity vs. labor productivity, 1890 to 2015
Figure illustrates capital intensity; the ratio of total capital stock over total hours worked and labor productivity; the
ratio of GDP over total hours worked. Both measured in 2010 US$ ppp per hour.
Average annual change in labor productivity (Bergeaud, Cette, and Lecat (2016))
Average annual change in capital Intensity (Bergeaud, Cette, and Lecat
Source: Bergeaud, A., Cette, G. and Lecat, R. (2016)
